lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to show politeness.
  • Nice to meet you! - Used when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A polite way to say farewell.

items.explanation_en: A common way to greet someone in the morning.
A standard greeting used in the evening.
An informal way to ask someone how they are doing.
A casual greeting to inquire about someone's situation.
A friendly way to express happiness at seeing someone again.
A way to ask someone about their well-being since you last met.
A friendly way to say goodbye and wish someone well.
A phrase used when you haven't seen someone in a while.
A straightforward way to ask about someone's well-being.
A way to ask someone if they have had a lot to do recently.
